name: A-Revel Ruiner
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Revel Ruiner enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: A-Incriminate
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.

name: A-Graveyard Shift
oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

name: A-Case the Joint
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then look at the top card of each player's library.
flavor_text: Steel doors and iron bars are child's play for an Obscura operative.

name: A-Demon's Due
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis extends his hand not in partnership, but to affirm your subservience.

name: A-Vampire Scrivener
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
Whenever you lose life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
flavor_text: No one remains on her list for long.

name: A-Psionic Snoop
oracle_text:
Flash
When Psionic Snoop enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: She knows your next move before you do.

name: A-Public Enemy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
All creatures attack enchanted creature's controller each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, draw two cards.
flavor_text: Every Halo smuggler walks a razor's edge between untold riches and sudden disaster.

name: A-Sewer Crocodile
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Quick, let's hide in the sewer!"
—Ginsi the Thief, now deceased

name: A-Buy Your Silence
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: A-Celebrity Fencer
oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Celebrity Fencer.
flavor_text: After a brief but memorable incident at her first performance, she was never heckled again.

name: A-Speakeasy Server
oracle_text:
Flying
When Speakeasy Server enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text: "Whatever ails you, friends, this will cure it for tonight! And leave you with a little inspiration for tomorrow."
